data.text:
This afternoon, President @JunckerEU Vice-President @jyrkikatainen and Commissioners @GOettingerEU and  @CorinaCretuEU take part in the conference "Shaping the Future" to discuss the #EUbudget and #EUaddedValue.
Event will be broadcast live on EbS: https://t.co/xiTuwUsTQU https://t.co/qS1LyRGAyX
📌 Take a look at the #TeamJunckerEU calendar for this week, including conference on #EUBudget and college visit to Bulgaria #EU2018BG  → https://t.co/Dhj7oZ2kBQ https://t.co/IcmSe4kFTg

data.text:
RIP Peter Sutherland. Former Commissioner, he was instrumental in shaping our internal market and our competition policy as we know it today. 

Our thoughts go to his family and friends. 

Statement by President @JunckerEU:  
https://t.co/nGZxdK9bJG https://t.co/lXhQeGBpHL
@MorphRv .@EUauditors have given the EU annual accounts a clean bill of health for 10 years in a row. Read more here → https://t.co/MFiNoB6BqY
The EU invests in the pioneering spirit of start-ups: 🇩🇪OUTFITTERY and tausendkind are re-thinking online-shopping with creative ideas https://t.co/M9VcMiQBfr #investEU https://t.co/qkp2xgTI59

data.text: It's time to sort the myth from the reality: for less than one cup of coffee a day, every EU citizen benefits from #EUbudget. https://t.co/8XC93CP9bd

Interested in the future of the #EUBudget? Tomorrow, @ECThinkTank organizes the conference "Shaping the Future" to discuss the next #MFF and #EUaddedValue.
→ Programme: https://t.co/ZIijeLt6tb
→ Follow event live on EbS: https://t.co/xiTuwUsTQU https://t.co/60CFFr0nHX
Would you like to learn more about #EUFunds for projects related to employment and social inclusion? Take a look at our webpage →  https://t.co/VP1wSIGTh1 https://t.co/dB0V5Jidqf

From #cybersecurity to #MigrationEU and #education trends, fresh up your mind in January with @ECThinkTank top 10 publications of the past year 
https://t.co/h7DFGTiPxR https://t.co/5q3RHBx59B

EU regulation on novel food comes into force in January. 
The changes will simplify the process of authorising novel food on the European market, while fully ensuring food safety → https://t.co/qTQXuCn2Xp https://t.co/LbNAfGdKHG

60 years ago today, Walter Hallstein became the first president of the European Commission of what was then the European Economic Community. He distinguished himself for being a committed European and a decisive proponent of European integration. https://t.co/nyLFBnbp70

data.text: @awlazel Hi Agnieszka, our goal is to gather views of the broader public on these two initiatives announced by President @JunckerEU in his State of the Union address. You're welcome to contribute your thoughts on the future of labour mobility & EU SSN. Thank you! Best, #EUHaveYourSay Team https://t.co/0c1wwwUEx3
The DRAGON project 🇦🇹 analyses tunnel excavation materials to put them to good use and help reduce pollution… with a little help from the EU https://t.co/3FkfUpRuoT #investEU https://t.co/iYEU31MXRc

It's your last chance to take part in our public consultation on setting up a European Labour Authority and a European Social Security Number. Share your views →  https://t.co/g187PCxvOW #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/4QexxgK915

Registration for paid traineeships in the European Commission is now open! 
→ Apply by 31 January: https://t.co/aIJHLxcOoz 
→ 3 reasons why you should apply: https://t.co/sV8Nz52R5Z

We will "open communities" in Leeuwarden and enjoy "Festa" in Valletta. These are the focus concepts of our European capitals of culture for 2018 → https://t.co/4ahvTs40Li #EuropeForCulture https://t.co/SkViTAgleE

As of January, national tax authorities will have direct access to information on the beneficial owners of companies, trusts and other entities. This will help prevent tax evasion and #moneylaundering → https://t.co/0mHiLMwVZU https://t.co/GRwWBfEeoL
Are the kids already bored of their presents? Check out our 'Sustainable Shaun' game that helps children learn about sustainability in a fun way →  https://t.co/qLopeRuHAV https://t.co/CtrPuVBdnk

@jyrkikatainen @A_Breidthardt @EIB About 540,000 small and medium enterprises are expected to benefit from the EU Fund for Strategic Investments → https://t.co/nzZFKN1ETt #JunckerPlan #investEU https://t.co/FokSh3CeuG

@jyrkikatainen @A_Breidthardt @EIB #JunckerPlan helps to maximise the growth potential of the European digital economy. In Greece, a €150 million loan agreement will help Cosmote's plans; in France, Iliad will receive support for superfast broadband → https://t.co/GyhbJBqbao #investEU https://t.co/pDt0TafAva
From wind farms in Belgium, to gas interconnection in Romania and gas smart metering in Italy: #JunckerPlan supports major energy projects → https://t.co/VPSup8YcwK #investEU https://t.co/6q45F3cG0s

Where does the financial support from the EU Fund for Strategic Investments go? 
From digital to energy projects, the #JunckerPlan represents a total financing volume of €51.1 billion in the 28 EU countries, supporting 300,000 jobs → https://t.co/Q5WdwDd7q4 #investEU https://t.co/8MlVDkYPfD
From the conference on #EUbudget on Monday to the launch of the Bulgarian presidency on Friday, check out #TeamJunckerEU agenda for the week to come → https://t.co/Dhj7oZ2kBQ https://t.co/Q4VM3d73GN

Looking for investors for your project idea? Use the #EIPP portal: 
✅free 
✅easy 
✅fast 
Learn more on https://t.co/iSp8G6dnmi #investEU https://t.co/zChI7w5XFX

Before being authorised, all novel foods must be scientifically proven to be safe to public health and meet a set of conditions for their use, their designation as food and labelling requirements. https://t.co/kyeLg3Z2oA

The new rules include a centralised EU-wide authorisation system of novel foods and of traditional foods from third countries, a list of all authorised novel foods in the EU, and data protection provisions for the applicants. https://t.co/xTHwdkR8m5

EU regulation on novel food comes into force in January. 
The changes will simplify the process of authorising novel food on the European market, while fully ensuring food safety → https://t.co/qTQXuCn2Xp https://t.co/zu3cYV9Bee
Registration for paid traineeships in the European Commission is now open! Apply by 31 January → https://t.co/aIJHLxcOoz https://t.co/UZbiRl1f4c

Next monday, @ECThinkTank will hold the conference "Shaping the Future" to discuss the next #MFF and #EUaddedValue. 
Full programme available here → https://t.co/ZIijeLt6tb https://t.co/sxzfW4yRF8

On #WorldBrailleDay, we congratulate once more our 2017 winner of the EU Prize for Women Innovators, Kristina Tsvetanova from Bulgaria, whose company produce the first tablets for blind users. https://t.co/ZJc3PSAYqW https://t.co/4NibkDbITj

Today is #WorldBrailleDay. Around 30 million visually impaired Europeans need assistance to access content online. We will award €3 million #HorizonPrize in 2018 to develop a tactile display for the visually impaired → https://t.co/pYd6dZmrfm https://t.co/uvuTNo3Vea

🇪🇸A spanish start-up, @OdiloTID, is opening up its e-reading online platform to schools with support from the #JunckerPlan. This is 1 of the 16 approved agreements with intermediary banks with EFSI backing in Spain → https://t.co/DEqqYl0h3s #investEU https://t.co/RZngVjmxFU

🇵🇹 In Portugal, #JunckerPlan supports not less than 18 infrastructure and innovation projects. The renovation of water and wastewater facilities by Águas de Portugal is one of them → https://t.co/oAhZoCpdZQ #investEU https://t.co/u7zl6BdWuq

🇬🇷 With a total of €1.7 billion financing, our support to Greece is set to trigger €5.7 billion in additional investments. Greece ranks second in investments triggered by #JunckerPlan per euro of GDP → https://t.co/432oyLMxvf #investEU https://t.co/8tQFDFvdCu

@jyrkikatainen @A_Breidthardt @EIB 🇪🇪 Tallinn airport benefitted from #JunckerPlan to improve environmental and safety performance. This is 1 out of 5 infrastructure projects supported by the EU Fund for Strategic Investments in Estonia → https://t.co/aOG1g9034q #investEU https://t.co/YtfHUVUxG4

The EU Fund for Strategic Investments is set to trigger more than €256 bn in investments across the EU! We are proud to highlight some key achievements and figures. Thread. → https://t.co/T7hKFvSsaj  #investEU #JunckerPlan https://t.co/3IM0vT2pWY

Leeuwarden 🇳🇱 and Valletta 🇲🇹 are our European Capitals of Culture in 2018. "Open community" and "Festa" are at the centre of their respective programme → https://t.co/4ahvTs40Li https://t.co/kiuGN4qMVI

New rules to prevent tax evasion and #moneylaundering enter into force in January. National tax authorities will now have direct access to information on the beneficial owners of companies, trusts and other entities → https://t.co/0mHiLMwVZU https://t.co/qelgnH1C13

⏳ Last day to share your views! How can we adapt tax systems to the new digital reality? Take part in our public consultation ➡ https://t.co/WNFLKdhdbR
#EUHaveYourSay #FairTaxation https://t.co/ukPWXA7uQL

data.text:
"Peaceful demonstration and freedom of expression are fundamental rights that apply to every country, and Iran is no exception. "
Declaration by @FedericaMog on behalf of the European Union on the situation in #Iran: https://t.co/0ip3OjW6pX

Our legislative priorities for this year:
- #SecurityUnion
- #MigrationEU in a spirit of responsibility & solidarity
- Jobs, growth & investment
- #SocialRights
- #DigitalSingleMarket
- #EnergyUnion
- Democratic legitimacy at EU level
→ https://t.co/sY0mszHkfb https://t.co/lx51U7GXPU

By May 2018, we will have one set of rules in place for all companies processing data in the EU. Our new Regulation will determine a shift in #DataProtection → https://t.co/Bn9SEBtXUf  #DigitalSingleMarket https://t.co/qTF0MjFbmg

data.text:
Starting this year, our #H2020 research and innovation programme will focus efforts on fewer topics with bigger budgets: 
→ €1 billion on #SecurityUnion
→ €1.7 billion on #Digitalisation
→ €3.3 billion on #ClimateChange
→ €1 billion on #CircularEconomy https://t.co/kVGxichAjJ
2017 ended – so did #roaming fees! A majority of Europeans now recognise benefits of roaming without extra charges → https://t.co/BARU5tUdwI https://t.co/lCb7kXBCJr

What does the EU #CustomsUnion mean for me? How does it benefit to EU citizens?
This year, we will celebrate the 50 years of our Customs Union. https://t.co/mVyGIwT4mR

This year, we will celebrate the 50 years of our Customs Union
#CustomsUnion saves you time and money. It also protects European businesses and the environment. https://t.co/pTrGWrchVn
Starting today, Bulgaria will take over the presidency of the @EUCouncil for the next six coming months. "United We Stand Strong" is their motto. https://t.co/SCyr8ihtYS https://t.co/5bstGyTNFm

2018 is the European Year of Cultural Heritage!
Cultural Heritage is more than monuments: it’s about our shared stories and experiences, our food, our books, our traditions. #EuropeForCulture https://t.co/Vb4KYgKns8
Happy New Year! https://t.co/5Fp3LgeAjY
@agapanthus49  https://t.co/Jq2I9ilFbu

Why a European Year of Cultural Heritage? What happens in 2018? 
Read our publication: https://t.co/Uihev4Guc3
#EYCH2018 #EuropeForCulture https://t.co/V9omKC9UKO
Highlight of the year: we put forward 5 scenarios on the #FutureofEurope, including ideas on unity for the #EU27 by 2025 → https://t.co/Iuk03MNaH9 https://t.co/eV9pC5IuYs

European unity started as the dream of a few, it became the hope of the many. 
This year, we celebrated with you the 60th anniversary of the Treaties of Rome. #EU60 https://t.co/DY26ZhwEec
thank you, @EUInterpreters!

#happynewyear in 🇪🇺's 24 official languages! 
How do you say it in your language? 
We'd like to wish everyone a very Happy New Year! 🎉 https://t.co/RzHq2CLpuI

During 2017:
• Optimism on the #FutureOfEurope has risen 📈
• Support for the euro 💶 has increased 📈
• Trust in the EU has gained ground 📈
Check out our latest #Eurobarometer blog post ⬇️
https://t.co/xCbUSmSnN8

Over 9 million people have benefited from #Erasmus in the last 30 years. 
Now we want to make the scheme twice as big → https://t.co/Fy2TPxwo56  #ErasmusPlus https://t.co/kHrlt8IbLz

In 2017, we celebrated the 30th anniversary of #Erasmus. 
Only 3,200 students participated in its first year, now they are over 300,000 a year! https://t.co/Fy2TPxwo56   #ErasmusPlus https://t.co/Yt9N6GkIsU

Citizens’ dialogues take place all across Europe. Our Commissioners and officials have met with you at hundreds of #EUdialogues in the style of town-hall debates.

Thank you for participating in the conversation on the #FutureofEurope! https://t.co/yPaTOQmvHJ

data.text: Watch highlights from President @JunckerEU's State of the European Union address speaking about the #FutureofEurope #SOTEU https://t.co/oR1pjQpknK

Our #EUSolidarityCorps celebrated its 1st anniversary in 2017!
We want to secure 100,000 placements by 2020 and boost solidarity activities across Europe. https://t.co/np9sY0S12T
Do you have a project in need of investment? Watch the #EIPP portal video and learn how to give visibility to your idea https://t.co/iSp8G6dnmi https://t.co/qJBGAvxBHs

Did you know that everybody can contribute to EU policy-making?
Learn more → https://t.co/B5QISnvTOE #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/RR6xWrrCO9

We proclaimed the European Pillar of Social Rights in November. 
From the right to fair wages to the right to health care, EU leaders committed to stand by 20 #SocialRights principles → https://t.co/rGaMiOOYGU #EURoad2Sibiu https://t.co/yzAxzzJ1LF

We celebrated the 60 years of the European Union in March this year.
From a continent ravaged by war and famine to a unique Union with strong common values, this is the story of the EU. #EU60 https://t.co/RjaUi12PH4

annotations.normalized_text: 2017 Princess of Asturias Award of Concord

data.text:
This year, we have been awarded the 2017 Princess of Asturias Award of Concord. 
We offered the amount of the Prize to the victims of wildfires in Portugal and Spain. https://t.co/XPfUVElKgw

This year, we announced the creation of #rescEU, a reserve of civil protection capabilities to protect European citizens and reinforce Member States ability to respond to natural disasters → https://t.co/ouPVKGgG4s  #EUCivPro https://t.co/Yz8cTIKAuz

Calling young #creative professionals and students! Pitch a video concept and support us in stopping violence against women. Submit your proposal by 10 February: https://t.co/2bAZ6LDHXy #SayNoStopVAW #MeToo https://t.co/uFFXCgPLuY

Did you know that the EU Fund for Strategic Investments is set to trigger more than €256 bn in investments across the EU? Check the breakdown by country: https://t.co/T7hKFvSsaj #investEU #JunckerPlan https://t.co/jGsoGSBmiE

We want to give Europe's innovative entrepreneurs every opportunity to become world leading companies. 
In November, we showed our support to innovators where the Tech World meets. #WebSummit #investEU https://t.co/RESUG26Kot

This year, we woke up the sleeping Beauty of the Lisbon Treaty.
The Permanent Structured Cooperation in defence is the first step towards a European Defence Union → https://t.co/Jf2vXjgEey #PESCO https://t.co/hfDYlolpP3

Growth of European economy is up, 
Unemployment is down, 
Investment is recovering, 
Public finances are improving. 
With the #WindInOurSails, the latest #EuropeanSemester showed strong economic momentum. → https://t.co/BPvhYV4F9Q https://t.co/4Q3QLDroRI

One Planet, no plan B. 
In December, we presented 10 transformative initiatives for a greener planet → https://t.co/bClsx97RXO  #ClimateAction https://t.co/CGp6h80RcM

In Gothenburg, we set out our vision to create a #EuropeanEducationArea by 2025 with:
→ Mobility for +500 000 school pupils
→ 2 million additional individuals benefiting from #ErasmusPlus
→ an EU Student Card to store information on academic records
https://t.co/Pl2s6vxYI0 https://t.co/cF9wgTyhSi
Your opinion counts on social rights! Answer our questionnaire → https://t.co/nlAUbcafAl #EUHaveYourSay #SocialRights https://t.co/RzsczCxTGA

Who pays for parks & playgrounds? Youngsters now have the opportunity to learn about how tax affects their lives via our new #TaxEdu portal → https://t.co/bhpC47DbQ3  #TaxBuilds https://t.co/QG2yLrw8qM
Merry Christmas and warm holiday wishes!  🇪🇺 🌟 https://t.co/SiuNL995mQ

All eyes are on the Arctic Circle: this is where #JunckerPlan supports the construction of the largest onshore wind farm in Europe! 
It will help Sweden to expand its renewable energy sector even beyond the objective set by the EU https://t.co/SBdHRtrW2c #investEU https://t.co/VtJUx3VfGJ

Watch the stars tonight!
Among other things, you may see one of our 22 Galileo satellites in orbit around the earth. #Galileo offers initial services for a year now → https://t.co/Fsj9Ac8ScG https://t.co/YpDTQ2wupG

data.text: When the weather gets colder, discover in front of the fireplace @Europeanaeu gallery of #WinterWonderland with paintings, photographs & drawings showing how Europeans have been celebrating and enjoying winter life throughout ages  ❄️ https://t.co/kLR9oxv8GR https://t.co/sQHTlU6pb4

Impatient kids at home? 
Discover with them our Youth Magazine "Our Planet, our Future". 
It's free to download  and available in all languages! https://t.co/0K72GWR2DQ https://t.co/8LPY7Qs6rF
How safe is your child's Christmas wishlist? Check for unsafe toys in the EU Rapid Alert System database: https://t.co/3H72pe17To https://t.co/pLljkLmZ2z
Driving home for Christmas with a #rentalcar? Know your #ConsumerRights to clear info when booking → https://t.co/6fM4B9HHSs https://t.co/Z0wZ7hgpZq
How safe are the gifts you chose for your family? Find out about #ProductSafety → https://t.co/h1QQbWkQXt https://t.co/nbJS4rFk4v
Signed up to a timeshare for Christmas breaks? You can still back out up to 14 days later! #ConsumerProtection → https://t.co/xxSAZdMrzW https://t.co/IbmiSctZYk
Got a faulty gift? EU #ConsumerRights gives a 2 year guarantee for repair, replacement or refunds! → https://t.co/e8B3XEY02s https://t.co/7QMuUMEHAT
Problems with something you bought on holiday in the EU? European Consumer Centres can help #ConsumerProtection → https://t.co/Q8AAtDU5go https://t.co/4EagXBvhmT
Feel like jetting off for Winter holidays? Make the most of your #ConsumerRights → https://t.co/MPUCBeQfzB https://t.co/J7FhxOYn3l

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.
entity.name: Travel Actions

data.text:
Travelling in the EU during the winter holidays? 
Since June, travellers do not pay any extra fees when making calls, sending SMS or going online when in another EU country → https://t.co/3flIjs8nYQ #roaming https://t.co/1IKlLKEgoz
Let's make a long story short: Europe's greatest achievements in emojis! https://t.co/PxfTw6JhgV

You found the perfect present online but #parceldelivery price is too high? We will soon make cross-border parcel delivery more affordable → https://t.co/SIoV07s7ud #SingleMarket #eCommerce https://t.co/n2aBmBQPTQ
You don't know our tips to buy safe products online yet? They are now available in all EU languages → https://t.co/KTM9DWWrKn #ThinkThenBuy https://t.co/KbPUvb1Wx3

Latest #investEU financial support: €330 million for SMEs in Austria 🇦🇹, €200 million for water infrastructure in Italy 🇮🇹 , €150 million for 5 projects in Spain 🇪🇸 & €50 million for a construction machinery rental service in Finland 🇫🇮 https://t.co/7KFIDfG2i8 https://t.co/c4968XL7gt

2017 has been a big year for #euromyths. Take a look at our top five #FakeNews stories of the year!

https://t.co/hdHUWEPwoS

Increasing vaccination: consultation on possible EU actions. Take part:  https://t.co/3uMNtPzqz6 
#EUhaveYourSay https://t.co/xSo94Rr4n9

Welcome to Lapland! EU-funded project from Finland 🇫🇮 , @arcticwarriors  is a small business on a mission: spread the health benefits of Lapland’s native herbs 🌿such as roseroot, angelica and nettle.  https://t.co/UTtgwGJviR #investEU https://t.co/9E62Z3PCMz

Adopted: decision to recognise trading venues in Switzerland as eligible for compliance with the trading obligation for shares set out  in the  new Markets in Financial Instruments Directive and Regulation - MiFID  II  https://t.co/lA4WKyuZrO https://t.co/K77t2adpbO

Who is covered under this Directive? What are new and non-standard forms of employment? Which new rules and minimum standards will this proposal introduce? Memo: https://t.co/xosRScadTp https://t.co/Cvm9Ce883A

We want all workers to benefit from new minimum standards, making their work conditions more transparent and predictable.
Our proposal: https://t.co/05XXaYsUIr #SocialRights https://t.co/w6bFh1Pf0Q

🔴 Live: press conference by @mariannethyssen on our new proposal that implements the European Pillar of #SocialRights: https://t.co/P0BIU0PzXA  
#SocialEurope https://t.co/kPGghT8aC9
